html:
The 14-inch MacBook Pro with an upgraded M4 Pro chip and 1TB of storage is on sale for $2,179, delivering a $220 price cut off MSRP.

The $2,179 price is valid on the M4 Pro spec featuring a 14-core CPU and 20-core GPU, which is an upgrade from the standard 12C CPU/16C GPU chip found in the M4 Pro line. The laptop also comes with 24GB of unified memory and a bump up to 1TB of storage, making it a well-equipped model that normally retails for $2,399.

Save $220 at Amazon

Both Amazon and Adorama are competing for your business by offering the $220 discount off MSRP (you must use promo code APINSIDER at Adorama*), with Adorama sweetening the deal by discounting 3-years of optional AppleCare by $30 with the APINSIDER code as well.

You can find these deals and dozens of additional offers in our M4 Pro 14-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide.

Technical specifications

  • 14-inch Liquid Retina XDR display
  • M4 Pro chip with a 14-core CPU & 20-core GPU
  • 16-core Neural Engine
  • 24GB unified memory
  • 1TB SSD

(*) How to apply the APINSIDER code at Adorama

Activating the APINSIDER coupon can be done in three easy steps, which are outlined below:

  1. Add the MacBook Pro to your Adorama shopping cart. Optional AppleCare can be tacked on in your cart as well.
  2. Proceed to checkout. When you get to step 4 (Payment), look for a link with a gift icon that says: "Do you have a gift card or promo code?"
  3. Click that link to bring up the promo code field and enter APINSIDER. Here's what the process looks like:

Enter promo code APINSIDER during Step 4 of checkout.

That's it! You should see the promo code discount reflected in your order total. For even more MacBook Pro deals, be sure to check out our Apple Price Guide.
